Lord Rance.\""},{"lineNumber":124056,"originalJapaneseLine":"「このままでは、ててなし子を産むことに」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"At this rate, you'll be giving birth to a fatherless child.\""},{"lineNumber":124057,"originalJapaneseLine":"「見つけて、捕まえて……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Finding him, catching him...\""},{"lineNumber":124058,"originalJapaneseLine":"　そうしたところで留まる男ではないでしょう」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"But he's not the kind of man who would stay put even if that happened.\""},{"lineNumber":124059,"originalJapaneseLine":"「それは……まあ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Well... I suppose...\""},{"lineNumber":124060,"originalJapaneseLine":"「父親がいないとは言え、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Even though there is no father,\""},{"lineNumber":124061,"originalJapaneseLine":"　例えば私には守るべき家などもありません。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"For example, I don't have a family I need to protect.\""},{"lineNumber":124062,"originalJapaneseLine":"　気楽なものです」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I'm more carefree.\""},{"lineNumber":124063,"originalJapaneseLine":"「それに、幸せなら頂きました」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"And besides, I have received happiness.\""},{"lineNumber":124064,"originalJapaneseLine":"その幸せを示す意味を込めて、","translatedEnglishLine":"Implying that happiness,"},{"lineNumber":124065,"originalJapaneseLine":"千姫が大きくなったお腹を撫でる。","translatedEnglishLine":"Chihime strokes her growing belly."},{"lineNumber":124066,"originalJapaneseLine":"「武人として生き、武人として死ぬ。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Living as a warrior, dying as a warrior."},{"lineNumber":124067,"originalJapaneseLine":"　それだけだと思っていた女を母にしてくれた」","translatedEnglishLine":"He made a woman who thought that was all, into a mother.\""},{"lineNumber":124068,"originalJapaneseLine":"「これ以上は望むべくもありません」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I could ask for nothing more.\""},{"lineNumber":124069,"originalJapaneseLine":"「う〜む……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hmm...\""},{"lineNumber":124070,"originalJapaneseLine":"「なんと……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"What...\""},{"lineNumber":124071,"originalJapaneseLine":"「もはや……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Already...\""},{"lineNumber":124072,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うぅ〜む……×３」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Uuuhmm... proposal?\""},{"lineNumber":124075,"originalJapaneseLine":"「新たな、縁談ですか……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"A new, matchmaking all...\""},{"lineNumber":124099,"originalJapaneseLine":"「何故、あのような男をそこまで……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Why go so far for a man like that...\""},{"lineNumber":124100,"originalJapaneseLine":"「色々とありますが……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"There are many reasons, but...\""},{"lineNumber":124101,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あの男の傍は退屈せずに済む」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Being by that man's side means you won't be bored.\""},{"lineNumber":124102,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あ、あうあう……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah, au au...\" (uncertain noise)"},{"lineNumber":124103,"originalJapaneseLine":"「こ、これは……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Th-this is...\""},{"lineNumber":124104,"originalJapaneseLine":"「いいですかな、千姫殿、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Is it alright, Lady Chihime,"},{"lineNumber":124105,"originalJapaneseLine":"　儂も説教臭いことは言いたくありませんが……」","translatedEnglishLine":"I don't want to sound preachy, but...\""},{"lineNumber":124106,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あっ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah!\""},{"lineNumber":124107,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ど、どうしました！？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"W-what happened!?\""},{"lineNumber":124108,"originalJapaneseLine":"「すみません、その話はまた後日に」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Sorry, we'll talk about that another day.\""},{"lineNumber":124109,"originalJapaneseLine":"「産まれそうです」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"It looks like the baby is coming.\""},{"lineNumber":124110,"originalJapaneseLine":"「へっ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Heh...\""}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: どうぞお気になさらず」「どうぞお気になさらず」
「むう、千姫殿がそう仰られるなら……」
「しかし、本当に良かったのですかな？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "But, are you really sure that's for the best?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あの男……ランス殿を捜さなくて、です」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Not looking for that man... Lord Rance."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「このままでは、ててなし子を産むことに」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "At this rate, you'll be giving birth to a fatherless child."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そうしたところで留まる男ではないでしょう」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "But he's not the kind of man who would stay put even if that happened."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 例えば私には守るべき家などもありません。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "For example, I don't have a family I need to protect."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「それに、幸せなら頂きました」
その幸せを示す意味を込めて、
千姫が大きくなったお腹を撫でる。
「武人として生き、武人として死ぬ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Living as a warrior, dying as a warrior.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それだけだと思っていた女を母にしてくれた」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He made a woman who thought that was all, into a mother."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「これ以上は望むべくもありません」
新たな縁談はいかがです？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: How about a new matchmaking proposal?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「子供を育てるのは一大事です。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Raising a child is a great responsibility.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: やはり、支えも頼るものも
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's best to have someone to support and rely on,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あるに越したことはありませんからのう」
少し年はいっておりますが、
とても誠実な人柄をしておりますぞ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but he's a very sincere person."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ランス以上の男はいますか？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Is there a man better than Rance?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 誰かの妻となるのも良いですね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: it might be good to become someone's wife."
we have to change Lady Chihime's outlook on life."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「変えなければ話にならないですな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Without changing that, there’s no point."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 将軍としては優れていたかも知れません」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: might have been excellent as a general."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ですが、一家を守る大黒柱としては、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "However, as the head of a family to protect,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「何故、あのような男をそこまで……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Why go so far for a man like that..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あの男の傍は退屈せずに済む」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Being by that man's side means you won't be bored."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 儂も説教臭いことは言いたくありませんが……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I don't want to sound preachy, but..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「すみません、その話はまた後日に」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Sorry, we'll talk about that another day."
"It looks like the baby is coming."

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English
